verses.verse: Then the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> assembled<WH6950> themselves at Shiloh,<WH7887> and set<WH7931> up the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> there;<WH8033> and the land<WH776> was subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> them.
And there remained<WH3498> among the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> seven<WH7651> tribes<WH7626> who<WH834> had not divided<WH2505> their inheritance.<WH5159>

So Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> "How<WH575> long<WH5704> will you put<WH7503> off<WH7503> entering<WH935> to take<WH3423> possession<WH3423> of the land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers, has given<WH1> you?

"Provide<WH3051> for yourselves three<WH7969> men<WH376> from each tribe<WH7626> that I may send<WH7971> them, and that they may arise<WH6965> and walk<WH1980> through the land<WH776> and write<WH3789> a description of it according<WH6310> to their inheritance;<WH5159> then they shall return<WH935> to me.

"And they shall divide<WH2505> it into seven<WH7651> portions;<WH2506> Judah<WH3063> shall stay<WH5975> in its territory<WH1366> on the south,<WH5045> and the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130> shall stay<WH5975> in their territory<WH1366> on the north.<WH6828>

"And you shall describe<WH3789> the land<WH776> in seven<WH7651> divisions,<WH2506> and bring<WH935> [the description] here<WH2008> to me. And I will cast<WH3384> lots<WH1486> for you here<WH6311> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> our God.<WH430>

"For the Levites<WH3881> have<WH369> no<WH369> portion<WH2506> among<WH7130> you, because<WH3588> the priesthood<WH3550> of the Lord<WH3068> is their inheritance.<WH5159> Gad<WH1410> and Reuben<WH7205> and the half-tribe of Manasseh<WH4519> also have received<WH3947> their inheritance<WH5159> eastward<WH4217> beyond<WH4480> <WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the Lord<WH3068> gave<WH5414> them."

Then the men<WH376> arose<WH6965> and went,<WH1980> and Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680> those who went<WH1980> to describe<WH3789> the land,<WH776> saying,<WH559> "Go<WH1980> and walk<WH1980> through the land<WH776> and describe<WH3789> it, and return<WH7725> to me; then I will cast<WH7993> lots<WH1486> for you here<WH6311> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> in Shiloh.<WH7887>"

So the men<WH376> went<WH1980> and passed<WH5674> through the land,<WH776> and described<WH3789> it by cities<WH5892> in seven<WH7651> divisions<WH2506> in a book;<WH5612> and they came<WH935> to Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> at Shiloh.<WH7887>

And Joshua<WH3091> cast<WH7993> lots<WH1486> for them in Shiloh<WH7887> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> and there<WH8033> Joshua<WH3091> divided<WH2505> the land<WH776> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> according to their divisions.<WH4256>

Now the lot<WH1486> of the tribe<WH4294> of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> came<WH5927> up according to their families,<WH4940> and the territory<WH1366> of their lot<WH1486> lay<WH3318> between<WH996> the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> and the sons<WH1121> of Joseph.<WH3130>

And their border<WH1366> on the north<WH6828> side<WH6285> was from the Jordan,<WH3383> then the border<WH1366> went<WH5927> up to the side<WH3802> of Jericho<WH3405> on the north,<WH6828> and went<WH5927> up through the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> westward;<WH3220> and it ended<WH1961> <WH8444> at the wilderness<WH4057> of Beth-aven.

And from there<WH8033> the border<WH1366> continued<WH5674> to Luz,<WH3870> to the side<WH3802> of Luz<WH3870> (that is, Bethel<WH1008>) southward;<WH5045> and the border<WH1366> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to Ataroth-addar, near<WH5921> the hill<WH2022> which<WH834> [lies] on the south<WH5045> of lower<WH8481> Beth-horon.

And the border<WH1366> extended<WH9638> [from there,] and turned<WH5437> round<WH5437> on the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> southward,<WH5045> from the hill<WH2022> which<WH834> [lies] before<WH5921> <WH6440> Beth-horon southward;<WH5045> and it ended<WH1961> <WH8444> at Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), a city<WH5892> of the sons<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063> This<WH2088> [was] the west<WH3220> side.<WH6285>

Then the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> [was] from the edge<WH7097> of Kiriath-jearim, and the border<WH1366> went<WH3318> westward<WH3220> and went<WH3318> to the fountain<WH4599> of the waters<WH4325> of Nephtoah.<WH5318>

And the border<WH1366> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the edge<WH7097> of the hill<WH2022> which<WH834> is in the valley<WH1516> of Ben-hinnom,<WH2011> which<WH834> is in the valley<WH6010> of Rephaim<WH7497> northward;<WH6828> and it went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the valley<WH1516> of Hinnom, to the slope<WH3802> of the Jebusite<WH2983> southward,<WH5045> and went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to En-rogel.

And it extended<WH9638> northward<WH6828> and went<WH3318> to En-shemesh and went<WH3318> to Geliloth,<WH1553> which<WH834> is opposite<WH5227> the ascent<WH4608> of Adummim,<WH131> and it went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the stone<WH68> of Bohan<WH932> the son<WH1121> of Reuben.<WH7205>
And it continued<WH5674> to the side<WH3802> in front<WH4136> of the Arabah<WH6160> northward,<WH6828> and went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the Arabah.<WH6160>

And the border<WH1366> continued<WH5674> to the side<WH3802> of Beth-hoglah northward;<WH6828> and the border<WH1366> ended<WH1961> <WH8444> at the north<WH6828> bay<WH3956> of the Salt<WH4417> Sea,<WH3220> at the south<WH5045> end<WH7097> of the Jordan.<WH3383> This<WH2088> [was] the south<WH5045> border.<WH1366>

Moreover, the Jordan<WH3383> was its border<WH1379> on the east<WH9506> side.<WH6285> This<WH2088> [was] the inheritance<WH5159> of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> according to their families<WH4940> [and] according to its borders<WH1367> all<WH5439> around.<WH5439>
Now the cities<WH5892> of the tribe<WH4294> of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> according to their families<WH4940> were Jericho<WH3405> and Beth-hoglah and Emek-keziz,
and Beth-arabah and Zemaraim<WH6787> and Bethel,<WH1008>
and Avvim<WH5761> and Parah<WH6511> and Ophrah,<WH6084>
and Chephar-ammoni and Ophni<WH6078> and Geba;<WH1387> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH9161>
Gibeon<WH1391> and Ramah<WH7414> and Beeroth,<WH881>
and Mizpeh<WH4708> and Chephirah<WH3716> and Mozah,<WH4681>
and Rekem<WH7552> and Irpeel<WH3416> and Taralah,<WH8634>

and Zelah,<WH6762> Haeleph<WH507> and the Jebusite<WH2983> (that is, Jerusalem<WH3389>), Gibeah,<WH1390> Kiriath;<WH7157> fourteen<WH702> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH9161> This<WH2088> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> according to their families.<WH4940>
